content.value:
I've always been jealous of male colleagues who get to move freely about the industry chasing jobs that challenge them.

They get to ask questions about the project in interviews.

I had to ask "how many women are in the team? How many are in leadership positions?"
content.html: I've always been jealous of male colleagues who get to move freely about the industry chasing jobs that challenge them. They get to ask questions about the project in interviews. I had to ask "how many women are in the team? How many are in leadership positions?"
